publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2475 Sandra White: Hospital Car Parking Charges Abolished—That the Parliament welcomes the decision of the Scottish Government to abolish car parking charges at NHS hospitals across Scotland; notes that these charges have been criticised by members of all political parties as a tax on the sick and believes that this decision reaffirming the founding principles of the NHS, namely that it should be free at the point of delivery, is one that should be welcomed across the political spectrum. Supported by: Alex Neil*, Alasdair Allan*, Kenneth Gibson*, Bob Doris*, Rob Gibson*, Aileen Campbell*, Bashir Ahmad*, Robin Harper*, Patrick Harvie*, Stuart McMillan*, Ian McKee*
S3M-2475 Hospital Car Parking Charges Abolished (lodged on 2 September 2008) Roseanna Cunningham*, Christine Grahame*, Christina McKelvie*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Bill Kidd*, Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-2475 Hospital Car Parking Charges Abolished (lodged on 2 September 2008) Gil Paterson*

S3M-2475 Sandra White: Hospital Car Parking Charges Abolished—That the Parliament welcomes the decision of the Scottish Government to abolish car parking charges at NHS hospitals across Scotland; notes that these charges have been criticised by members of all political parties as a tax on the sick and believes that this decision reaffirming the founding principles of the NHS, namely that it should be free at the point of delivery, is one that should be welcomed across the political spectrum. Supported by: Alex Neil, Alasdair Allan, Kenneth Gibson, Bob Doris, Rob Gibson, Aileen Campbell, Bashir Ahmad, Robin Harper, Stuart McMillan, Ian McKee, Roseanna Cunningham, Christine Grahame, Christina McKelvie, Shirley-Anne Somerville, Bill Kidd, Jamie Hepburn, Gil Paterson
S3M-2475 Hospital Car Parking Charges Abolished (lodged on 2 September 2008) Brian Adam*
